comments.body: This is just a style thing, but all of these capitalized method names (even for static methods) don't follow any style guide I've ever seen, either for spark or scala.
comments.diffHunk:

         kafkaParams,
         offsetRanges,
-        PreferFixed.create(leaders)
+        LocationStrategy.PreferFixed(leaders)
